content.overview: KangNaengBot (hereinafter referred to as "Service") establishes and discloses this Privacy Policy in accordance with Article 30 of the Personal Information Protection Act to protect the personal information of data subjects (users) and to handle related complaints swiftly and smoothly. This policy applies when using the Service.

purpose.intro: The Service processes personal information for the following purposes. Personal information being processed will not be used for purposes other than the following, and if the purpose of use changes, necessary measures such as obtaining separate consent will be taken in accordance with Article 18 of the Personal Information Protection Act.

service.title: 1. Service Provision
items: AI-based Kangnam University academic information Q&A service
Conversation history storage and management
Personalized academic information and schedule guidance

member.title: 2. Member Management
items: Confirmation of membership registration intent and identity verification
Maintenance and management of member qualifications
Prevention of unauthorized use of services

improvement.title: 3. Service Improvement
items: Service usage analysis and statistics
AI model quality improvement (using anonymized data)
Development of new services and feature improvements

signup.items: Email address, Google account profile information (name, profile image)

profile.items: Nickname, student ID, affiliation (college, department, major), grade, semester

usage.items: Conversation content (questions and AI responses), conversation session information

auto.items: Access time, browser information, device information (server logs)

items.warning: Please do not enter sensitive personal information (social security numbers, financial information, health information, passwords, etc.) in AI conversations while using the service. The user is responsible for any sensitive information entered.

method.intro: The Service collects personal information through the following methods:
method.usageDesc: Content entered by users during conversations with AI chatbot
method.autoDesc: Access logs automatically generated during service usage

period.intro: The Service destroys personal information without delay after the purpose of collection and use has been achieved. However, the following information is retained for the specified period for the reasons stated below:

chat.period: Until account deletion or deletion request

log.reason: Protection of Communications Secrets Act Article 15-2

guest.period: Upon session end or after 7 days

destruction.intro: The Service destroys personal information without delay when it is no longer needed due to the expiration of the retention period or achievement of processing purposes.

procedure.title: Destruction Procedure
procedure.content: Information entered by users is moved to a separate database after the purpose is achieved and stored for a certain period according to internal policies and relevant laws before being destroyed immediately.

method.title: Destruction Method
method.electronicDesc: Deleted using technical methods that make recovery and reproduction impossible

thirdParty.intro: The Service, in principle, processes users' personal information within the scope of purposes specified in Article 1 and does not process beyond the original purpose or provide to third parties without prior consent of the data subject.
thirdParty.exception: However, the following cases are exceptions:
exceptions: When the data subject has given prior consent to third-party provision
When there are special provisions in laws or when it is unavoidable to comply with legal obligations

When the data subject or their legal representative cannot express their intention or prior consent cannot be obtained due to unknown address, etc., and it is clearly necessary for urgent life, body, or property interests of the data subject or third party
When providing personal information in a form that cannot identify a specific individual for statistics compilation and academic research purposes

consignment.intro: The Service entrusts personal information processing as follows for smooth service provision:

gcp.task: Server hosting and data storage (Google Cloud Run)

ai.task: Response generation through AI model API

consignment.notice: When concluding consignment contracts, matters regarding prohibition of personal information processing beyond consignment purposes, technical and administrative protection measures, re-consignment restrictions, supervision of consignees, and liability for damages are specified in contract documents, and we supervise whether consignees process personal information safely.

training.title: Training Data Usage:
training.content: Anonymized conversation data may be used for AI model improvement to enhance service quality. In this case, information that can identify individuals is completely removed.

anonymization.title: De-identification Measures:
anonymization.content: Data used for AI training is pseudonymized or anonymized to ensure that specific individuals cannot be identified.

response.title: AI Response Generation:
response.content: The Service uses external AI model APIs to generate responses. Users' questions may be transmitted to the AI service provider for response generation, and technical measures for personal information protection are applied in this process.

optout.title: Right to Refuse Training Data:
optout.content: Users can refuse to have their conversation data used for AI training. The refusal intention can be expressed by contacting the Chief Privacy Officer.

rights.intro: Data subjects (users) can exercise the following rights related to personal information protection at any time:

access.title: Request for Access:
access.content: View the current status of personal information processing

correction.title: Request for Correction/Deletion:
correction.content: Request correction or deletion if there are errors

suspension.title: Request for Processing Suspension:
suspension.content: Request suspension of personal information processing

withdrawal.title: Withdrawal of Consent:
withdrawal.content: Withdraw consent for collection and use of personal information

deletion.title: Account Deletion:
deletion.content: End service use and delete all personal information

profile.title: Profile Settings:
profile.content: Directly modify or delete in the profile settings page within the service

chat.title: Conversation History:
chat.content: Individual session deletion is available within the service

withdrawal.title: Account Deletion:
withdrawal.content: Request through profile settings or contact the Chief Privacy Officer

rights.notice: Rights can be exercised through writing, phone, email, etc., and the Service will take action without delay. If the data subject requests correction or deletion of errors in personal information, the Service will not use or provide the personal information until correction or deletion is completed.

automated.intro: The Service uses AI to automatically generate responses to users' questions. In this regard, data subjects have the following rights:

explanation.title: Request for Explanation of Automated Decisions:
explanation.content: You can request a general explanation of how AI generates responses.

objection.title: Right to Object:
objection.content: If you believe the AI's response is inaccurate or inappropriate, you can raise an objection.

automated.notice: However, AI responses from this Service are provided only for academic information guidance purposes and do not make legal decisions that significantly affect users' rights or obligations.

children.paragraph1: The Service does not collect personal information of children under 14 years of age. The Service is primarily intended for university students and university staff and is not targeted at use by children under 14.
children.paragraph2: If we become aware that personal information of a child under 14 has been collected, we will destroy it without delay.

cookies.intro: The Service uses the browser's 'Local Storage' to provide personalized services to users. Unlike cookies, local storage is not automatically transmitted to the server and is stored only in the user's browser.

token.title: Authentication Token (access_token)
token.desc: Used for login state maintenance and API authentication

auth.title: User Information Cache (auth-storage)
auth.desc: User profile and authentication state caching

i18n.title: Language Detection Cache (i18next)
i18n.desc: Language detection results for multilingual support

cookies.deleteIntro: Users can delete local storage data through browser settings or developer tools. Upon deletion, the login state will be terminated and settings will be reset.

safety.intro: The Service takes the following technical, administrative, and physical measures to ensure safety in accordance with Article 29 of the Personal Information Protection Act:

technical.title: üîí Technical Measures
items: Encrypted data transmission via SSL/TLS
Encrypted storage of sensitive information (hash, AES)
JWT token-based authentication system
Regular security vulnerability checks
Operation of intrusion detection and prevention systems

administrative.title: üìã Administrative Measures
items: Minimize personal information handlers
Separate personal information processing permissions
Establish and implement internal management plans
Access permission management and log recording
Regular internal audits

officer.intro: The Service designates a Chief Privacy Officer as follows to take overall responsibility for personal information processing and to handle complaints and damage relief related to personal information processing by data subjects.
officer.title: Chief Privacy Officer
officer.notice: Data subjects can contact the Chief Privacy Officer regarding all personal information protection inquiries, complaint handling, and damage relief that occur while using the Service. The Service will respond and process inquiries from data subjects without delay.

remedy.intro: Data subjects can apply for dispute resolution or consultation to the Personal Information Dispute Mediation Committee, Korea Internet & Security Agency Privacy Center, etc. for relief from personal information infringement.

spo.org: Supreme Prosecutors' Office Cyber Investigation Department

items: This Privacy Policy is effective from the enforcement date, and if there are additions, deletions, and corrections of changes according to laws and policies, we will notify through announcements 7 days before the enforcement of changes.

However, if important matters such as the purpose of collecting/using personal information, third-party provision targets, etc. change, we will notify at least 30 days in advance and may obtain user consent again if necessary.

addendumContent.effectiveDate: This Privacy Policy is effective from December 10, 2025.

items.content: AI responses do not replace professional advice such as legal, medical, or financial advice. For professional matters, please consult with experts in the relevant field.

items.title: Real-time Information Limitation:

items.title: User Verification Obligation:
items.content: Users must verify the accuracy and suitability of AI responses themselves, and total reliance on AI responses is not recommended.
